title: Tales of Crestoria: Toga Waga wo Shoite Kare wa Tatsu
alternative_title: Tales of Crestoria: The Wake of Sin, TALES OF CRESTORIA-咎我ヲ背負いて彼は発つ-
description: Short animated TV special depicting the prologue of the main story of TALES OF CRESTORIA, showing Kanata and Misella setting off on their journey.
